data.system_settings: Android 5.1; Was already posted as iOS bug at <https://trello.com/c/clkHitvr>, probably is a https://trello.com/c/clkHitvr backend
data.actual_result: "When posted as links to chat" is reset to "on" state
data.short_description: "When posted as links to chat" image preview option resets to "on" when sync is enabled
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to User Settings, text & images - Turn the "When posted as links to chat" off and "Sync across clients" to "on" - Relaunch your Discord app two times - Go again to User Settings, text & images
